metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15217 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.3. There is a NULL pointer dereference caused by a malicious USB device in the drivers/media/usb/zr364xx/zr364xx.c driver. It was discovered that ZR364XX Camera USB device driver for the Linux kernel did not properly initialize memory. A physically proximate attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

notes.Note: tyhicks> Setting priority to negligible since this simple DoS requires a malicious USB device to be inserted into the system

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
